summary: The candidate shows limited understanding of core machine learning concepts and requires foundational reinforcement. Basic topics like supervised/unsupervised learning, regression/classification, and evaluation metrics need review. Advanced areas like neural networks and deployment are minimal.

Understanding of model evaluation (accuracy, precision, recall)
Familiarity with basic algorithms (linear regression, decision trees)
